meta_title: What is a Maintenance Call-Out? Definition & SOP Guide
meta_description: A maintenance call-out is an unscheduled request for emergency repairs outside standard shifts. Explore how call-outs impact MTTR and operational costs.
title: Maintenance Call-Out Definition

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Maintenance Call-Out Definition

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic image of a maintenance technician in high-visibility PPE and a hard hat, standing in a dimly lit industrial factory at night. The technician is looking at a glowing tablet screen that displays a critical alert. In the background, a large industrial pump or motor is visible under focused emergency spotlights. The atmosphere is professional and urgent, emphasizing an after-hours emergency response.
